Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 11th overall pick, by Boston in 1983...
Injured on 4/2/1983 with a Bruised Ribs, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/16/1983 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 4/14/1987 with a Bruised Ribs, out for one week...
Injured on 7/31/1987 with a Bruised Finger, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1989, off Moose Haas (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/1989, off Mike Overy (OAK)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1991, hitting .667 with 3 HR, 13 RBI...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Injured on 5/7/1992 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1992, hitting .526 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 7 RBI against New York (A) on 9/20/1993...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/22/1993, hitting .481 with 4 HR, 17 RBI...
Injured on 5/2/1995 with a Fractured Hand, out for 5 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Minnesota on 6/3/1996...
Injured on 7/16/1996 with a Broken Cheekbone, out for 5 weeks...
Traded from Boston to Baltimore on 7/21/1996 (Going to BOS: 2B R. Gant. Going to BAL: C B. Santiago)...
